title: Elevated Estate with Picturesque View for Sale
details:
This is a super property which has Tea, Cloves, pepper, duriyan and teak on 17 acres and another 2 acres of paddy land in Balana, Kadugannawa.

The top of the estate has a view of Mawanella town and Kandy with a "Punche Lokanthaya" and train travelling on a long range.Road up to the estate which is 4.5Km to the Kadugannawa Railway Station.Water,Power and Telecom connections available.

2 Acres Paddy Land very fertile but had not been cultivated
for around 3-5 Years.We had got a crop of around 3000 Kgs
on the Maha cultivation period.

Property Ideal for Eco Tourism project.

The estate is presently leased.

Selling Price :- LKR 82.50 Million

NO BROKERS/AGENTS PLEASE
